```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(dplyr)
library(metafor)
```

Load Data
```{r}

load("~/Documents/Duke- Semester Spring 2020/Philosphy Independent Study/df.RData")

```

Carrying out the Model with StudyID as the third level
```{r}



full.model <- rma.mv(data = df, y = ES,
                    V = esvar,
                     random = ~ 1 | Authors/StudyID, 
                     tdist = TRUE,
                     method = "REML")

summary(full.model)

```

Carry out the Model with Sample as the third level
```{r}


full.model1 <- rma.mv(data = df, y = ES,
                    V = esvar,
                     random = ~ 1 | Authors/`Sample#`, 
                     tdist = TRUE,
                     method = "REML")

summary(full.model1)

```
